page.title: 06Changing Times in Ryhope
page.content:
We were interested in how{Ryhope had changed since our parents and grandparents were young. When we asked how Ryhope had changed most people remembered the pit and how Ryhope was much smaller, quieter and there were a lot more open spaces. Most people worked at the{Ryhope Pit,}the {Co-operative store}or{Cherry Knowle {Hospital.
When our parents and grandparents were young many of their games were played in the street. Many children today seem to spend a great deal of their free time watching television or playing computer games. Some children do play games in the street but have to be careful of traffic and parked cars.
